Action.author: spivachuk
Action.body: Found a problem with narrowing watermarks on backup replicas from {{(0, sys.maxsize)}} to {{(0, LOG_SIZE)}} on primary propagation completion. This breaks ordering on a backup replica if {{pp_seq_no}} of the next 3PC-batch being processing is greater than {{LOG_SIZE}} (by default is {{300}}). INDY-1462 has been logged about this problem.
